description: With a streamline fit and versatile fabric, the Salto Ripstop Short lets you jump on whatever the day throws your way in confidence. Made from certified BCI Cotton, this pant features a full zippered fly, an encased elastic drawcord, and a travel zip pocket for barely-there, essential storage. Also available in women’s.
name: Cotopaxi Salto Ripstop Shorts - Mens
